024
025package io.blt.util;
026
027import io.blt.util.functional.ThrowingConsumer;
028import io.blt.util.functional.ThrowingSupplier;
029import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
030import java.util.Optional;
031import java.util.function.Supplier;
032
033import static java.util.Objects.nonNull;
034
035/**
036 * Static utility methods for operating on {@code Object}.
037 */
038public final class Obj {
039
040    private Obj() {
041        throw new IllegalAccessError("Utility class should be accessed statically and never constructed");
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Passes the {@code instance} to the {@code consumer}, then returns the {@code instance}.
046     * e.g.
047     * <pre>{@code
048     * var user = Obj.poke(new User(), u -> {
049     *     u.setName("Greg");
050     *     u.setAge(15);
051     * });
052     * }</pre>
053     * <p>
054     * Optionally, the {@code consumer} may throw which will bubble up.
055     * </p>
056     *
057     * @param instance instance to consume and return
058     * @param consumer operation to perform on {@code instance}
059     * @param <T>      type of {@code instance}
060     * @param <E>      type of {@code consumer} throwable
061     * @return {@code instance} after accepting side effects via {@code consumer}.
062     */
063    public static <T, E extends Throwable> T poke(T instance, ThrowingConsumer<T, E> consumer) throws E {
064        consumer.accept(instance);
065        return instance;
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Calls the {@code supplier} to retrieve an instance which is mutated by the {@code consumer} then returned.
070     * e.g.
071     * <pre>{@code
072     * var user = Obj.tap(User::new, u -> {
073     *     u.setName("Greg");
074     *     u.setAge(15);
075     * });
076     * }</pre>
077     * <p>
078     * Optionally, the {@code consumer} may throw which will bubble up.
079     * </p>
080     *
081     * @param supplier supplies an instance to consume and return
082     * @param consumer operation to perform on supplied instance
083     * @param <T>      type of instance
084     * @param <E>      type of {@code consumer} throwable
085     * @return Supplied instance after applying side effects via {@code consumer}.
086     */
087    public static <T, E extends Throwable> T tap(Supplier<T> supplier, ThrowingConsumer<T, E> consumer) throws E {
088        return poke(supplier.get(), consumer);
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Returns {@code value} if non-null, else invokes and returns the result of {@code supplier}.
093     * <p>
094     * Optionally, the {@code supplier} may throw which will bubble up.
095     * </p>
096     * e.g.
097     * <pre>{@code
098     * private URL homepageOrDefault(URL homepage) throws MalformedURLException {
099     *     return orElseGet(homepage, () -> new URL("https://google.com"));
100     * }
101     * }</pre>
102     *
103     * @param value    returned if non-null
104     * @param supplier called and returned if {@code value} is null
105     * @param <T>      type of the returned value
106     * @param <E>      type of {@code supplier} throwable
107     * @return {@code value} if non-null, else the result of {@code supplier}
108     * @throws E {@code Throwable} that may be thrown if the {@code supplier} is invoked
109     */
110    public static <T, E extends Throwable> T orElseGet(T value, ThrowingSupplier<T, E> supplier) throws E {
111        return nonNull(value) ? value : supplier.get();
112    }
113
114    /**
115     * Invokes and returns the result of {@code supplier} if no exception is thrown, else returns {@code defaultValue}.
116     * e.g.
117     * <pre>{@code
118     * private InputStream openFileOrResource(String name) {
119     *     return orElseOnException(
120     *             () -> new FileInputStream(name),
121     *             getClass().getResourceAsStream(name));
122     * }
123     * }</pre>
124     *
125     * @param supplier        called and returned if no exception is thrown
126     * @param defaultValue    returned if an exception is thrown when calling {@code supplier}
127     * @param <T>             type of the returned value
128     * @param <E>             type of {@code supplier} throwable
129     * @return result of {@code supplier} if no exception is thrown, else {@code defaultValue}
130     */
131    public static <T, E extends Throwable> T orElseOnException(ThrowingSupplier<T, E> supplier, T defaultValue) {
132        return supplier.orOnException(defaultValue);
133    }
134
135    /**
136     * Returns a new instance of the same type as the input object if possible; otherwise, returns empty.
137     * Supports only instances of concrete types that have a public zero argument constructor.
138     * e.g.
139     * <pre>{@code
140     * public <K, V> Map<K, V> mapOfSameTypeOrHashMap(Map<K, V> map) {
141     *     return newInstanceOf(map).orElse(new HashMap<>());
142     * }
143     * }</pre>
144     *
145     * @param obj object to try and create a new instance of
146     * @param <T> type of {@code obj}
147     * @return a new instance of the same type as {@code obj} or empty
148     */
149    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
150    public static <T> Optional<T> newInstanceOf(T obj) {
151        try {
152            return Optional.of((T) obj.getClass().getConstructor().newInstance());
153        } catch (InstantiationException
154                 | IllegalAccessException
155                 | InvocationTargetException
156                 | NoSuchMethodException e) {
157            return Optional.empty();
158        }
159    }
160
161}
